# Assignment 03

```{r}
library(xml2)
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(robotstxt)
```

```{r}
is_allowed <- paths_allowed("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Boulevard,_Chicago")

url <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Boulevard,_Chicago")

nds <- html_nodes(url, xpath = '//*[contains(concat( " ", @class, " " ), concat( " ", "us-census-pop-left", " " ))]')

nds

historical_population <- html_table(nds)

hist_table <- as.data.frame(historical_population[1])

final_table <- hist_table[-c(3)]

final_table
```
